typography.colors: Modern theme with a neutral color palette, possibly using shades of gray, blue, or green for a professional look.
typography.typography: Sans-serif fonts for readability, with varying weights to establish hierarchy.
typography.spacing: Consistent padding and margins to ensure a clean and organized appearance.
typography.visual_hierarchy: Use of size, color, and spacing to guide user attention.

structure.description: The layout likely follows a modern web dashboard structure with a grid system. It may include a sidebar for navigation, a header for quick actions, and a main content area for detailed information.

typography.colors: Modern theme with a neutral color palette, possibly using shades of gray, blue, or green for a professional look.
typography.typography: Sans-serif fonts for readability, with varying weights to establish hierarchy.
typography.spacing: Consistent padding and margins to ensure a clean and organized appearance.
typography.visual_hierarchy: Use of size, color, and spacing to guide user attention.

accessibility_notes.a11y_considerations: Ensure color contrast meets WCAG standards, keyboard navigability, and ARIA labels for screen readers.

prompt_for_platform.description: Utilize magic-pattern's component library to implement a responsive web dashboard. Leverage their grid system for layout and ensure all interactive elements are accessible.
